text: Lochhman Garhi is a village in Dehradun district of Uttarakhand, India. The Indian Military College was founded there in 1922.Singh, Bikram and Mishra, Sidharth (1997) Where Gallantry is Tradition: Saga of Rashtriya Indian Military College page 7 ==Notes== Category:Villages in Dehradun district
title: Lochhman Garhi
